name: Migration
description:
This work is a reflection on the subject of the migration of marginalized and vulnerable groups of people crossing physical and metaphorical borders journeying through perilous conditions in hopes of a better life not knowing what they will find along the way.

Subsequently, it is also a tribute to those same groups, who have, against tremendous odds, learned how to creatively code, make art, and navigate the NFT market, which in turn makes the world a bit more of an equitable place. 

Made in Blender 2.93.6
